common_errors.cause: Current directory is not a Bazaar branch
common_errors.solution: Initialize with: bzr init; Or navigate to an existing branch

common_errors.cause: File specified doesn't exist in working tree
common_errors.solution: Check filename and path. Use: bzr ls to see tracked files

common_errors.cause: Local and remote branches have independent commits
common_errors.solution: Use bzr merge to combine changes, then commit and push

common_errors.cause: Operation requires clean working tree but uncommitted changes exist
common_errors.solution: Commit changes with bzr commit, or shelve with bzr shelve

common_errors.cause: Insufficient permissions to access branch or write to location
common_errors.solution: Check file/directory permissions. Verify SSH key or authentication for remote branches.

common_errors.cause: Unable to connect to remote branch server
common_errors.solution: Check server URL and port. Verify server is running. Check firewall settings.

common_errors.cause: HTTP server returned unexpected response (proxy issues, auth required)
common_errors.solution: Check proxy settings. Verify URL is correct. May need authentication.

common_errors.cause: Merge resulted in conflicts that require manual resolution
common_errors.solution: Edit conflicted files (marked with <<<<<<<). Then: bzr resolve <file> and bzr commit

common_errors.cause: Command doesn't exist or is misspelled
common_errors.solution: Use bzr help commands to see available commands

common_errors.cause: Trying to init a branch in directory that's already a branch
common_errors.solution: Use existing branch or remove .bzr directory to start fresh
